questions.question: How motivated are you to earn your degree?

answers.answer: Earning a degree is a top priority for me
I'm ready and think I can balance school and life
I'm almost ready to go back to school, but worry life will get in the way
I might be ready soon but it's still not enough of a priority
I'm not very motivated at all

questions.question: How do you feel about studying?

answers.answer: I enjoy learning and definitely get into the zone studying
I don't mind studying if I'm interested in the topic
I don't mind studying if I like the way information is presented
I've struggled with studying in the past, but think I might be ready now
I can't make myself study no matter what

A few hours total a week

I'm pretty confident in my time-management skills

answers.answer: I have a mentor or advisor

questions.question: How comfortable are you with using technology for online learning and research?

answers.answer: I am really comfortable with computers and would prefer learning online
I’m okay with computers, but would prefer a mix of online and in-person learning
I think I would do better with in-person classes and textbooks
I’m not sure if online or in-person would be a good fit for me

answers.answer: I have a plan and resources

questions.question: What’s your age range?
questions.description: It’s never too early (or late) to go back to school! But knowing your approximate age will help us provide relevant advice.
